description: The government insists the response to its plea for islanders to take staycations has been "positive".
title: Isle of Man tourism 'showing resilience' despite staycation snub
title_page: Isle of Man tourism 'showing resilience' despite staycation snub - BBC News
maintext: The border restriction had given Manx people an "opportunity to reconnect with the island" and some were booking various stays in several places, he added.
